channel.title: Pros and cons of using Azure (RuneSource)
channel.description: So basically, I'm looking for a server to upgrade from Project Insanity to, and Hyperion is completely out of the question... So I'm looking into Azure (RuneSource). So comparing it to PI, how does it rank (pros and cons). And if ya know a good RuneSource server, please don't hesitate to send it my way. :P

item.title: Pros and cons of using Azure (RuneSource)
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

The pros far out weigh the cons.

Read full topic
item.source: Pros and cons of using Azure (RuneSource)
